span.span: (to go out, go to work etc. )
his questions were a bit too close to home
他的问题有点过于直截了当
a home from British or away from US home
home is where the heart is
to make a place one's home
温布尔登，网球的发源地
this region is the home of many species of wild flower
这个地区有很多种类的野花
the Rockies are home to bears and mountain lions
落基山脉地区是熊和美洲狮的栖息地
to find a home for sth
送某人/开车送某人回家
when will he be home from work?
他什么时间下班回到家？
to be nothing to write home about
to be home and dry British, to be home free US
it's great to be home and seeing all my old friends again
回到家乡再次见到所有老朋友太好了
I wonder how everyone's getting on back home in England
我想知道大家在英格兰老家的情况
the favourite romped home 3 lengths ahead
那匹热门马以领先3个马身的优势轻松到达终点
the torpedo struck home on the hull of the ship
她的话的确说到了点子上
to drive or hammer sth home (to sb)
the television pictures brought home to us the full horror of the attack
电视画面使我们清楚真切地了解到袭击的恐怖
he feels very at home on a horse
he's not really at home on the stage
I'm not at home to anyone today
sharks can home in on tiny amounts of blood in the sea
鲨鱼在海里能精确定位极少量的血
the FBI has begun to home in on the Guatemalan connection
联邦调查局已经盯上了危地马拉的贩毒网络
